scripts.build:dev: env ENV=dev PORT=3081 CORS=http://localhost:3000 DELAY=3000 BIG_DELAY=43200000 tsc && tsc-alias
scripts.build:staging: env ENV=dev PORT=3081 CORS=https://dev.masochist.me DELAY=3000 BIG_DELAY=43200000 tsc && tsc-alias
scripts.build:prod: env ENV=prod PORT=3002 CORS=https://masochist.me DELAY=3000 BIG_DELAY=43200000 tsc && tsc-alias
scripts.api:dev: env ENV=dev PORT=3081 CORS=http://localhost:3000 DELAY=3000 BIG_DELAY=43200000 npx tsx lib/api.ts
scripts.api:dev:watch: env ENV=dev PORT=3081 CORS=http://localhost:3000 DELAY=3000 BIG_DELAY=43200000 nodemon --exec npx tsx lib/api.ts
scripts.api:staging: env ENV=dev PORT=3081 CORS=https://dev.masochist.me DELAY=3000 BIG_DELAY=43200000 node dist/api.js
scripts.api:prod: env ENV=prod PORT=3002 CORS=https://masochist.me DELAY=3000 BIG_DELAY=43200000 node dist/api.js
scripts.api:prod:watch: env ENV=prod PORT=3002 CORS=https://masochist.me DELAY=3000 BIG_DELAY=43200000 nodemon --exec npx tsx lib/api.ts
scripts.api:prod:test:danger: env ENV=prod PORT=3081 CORS=http://localhost:3000 DELAY=3000 BIG_DELAY=43200000 nodemon --exec npx tsx lib/api.ts
